*These works were completed throughout fall 2023 and winter 2024 for the 2024 American Planning Association (APA) Student Planning and Design Competition. My team qualified as one of the top three finalist teams, and we will present our proposal at the National Planning Conference in Minneapolis in 2024. # Prompt

Student teams were tasked with developing specific planning and design recommendations for the New Nicollet Redevelopment site, a vacant former Kmart lot at the intersection of Lake Street and Nicollet Avenue in Minneapolis, Minnesota.
